In turn, the Rafako rally seems to have definitely come to an end in the face of new information.

title: NBP bought the most gold among central banks this year
description: By the end of September, the National Bank of Poland had purchased 42 tons of gold to increase its currency reserves, the largest amount among central banks in the world this year, the think tank OMFIF reported, citing data from the World Gold Council.

title: Polish Gaming Horror Charts: Several Years of Growth Eradicated in Three Months
description: The 11 bit studios sell-off has brought the stock to its lowest level since March 2018. This is not the only major gaming company on the WSE that has been hitting multi-year lows in recent weeks. We show you charts of horrors for companies from the industry listed on the WSE. Although 95% of WIG-Gry companies are in the red this year, the entire index is recording some of the highest sectoral rates of return.

title: Beer rationing? Guinness keeps the English waiting
description: An Irish pub in Liverpool uses an average of 12 50-litre barrels a week. It has now received just half of its order. Across England, there are shortages of the Irish drink. Some bars have been without it since last Friday. Distributors say they are saving up to make it through Christmas and New Year's Eve, especially since the warehouses were emptied during the rugby games.

title: Auto giant winds down part of business: $10 billion down the drain
description: General Motors said it would stop funding and end development of a robotaxi at Cruise. The project had cost $10 billion, but GM said it would now focus on developing autonomous systems for use in personal vehicles.

title: LPP Group posted PLN 579 million in net profit in Q3, compared to the consensus of PLN 634.6 million
description: The LPP Group had PLN 579 million of net profit of the parent company in the third quarter of the 2024/25 financial year, compared to PLN 576 million a year ago, the company reported in a report. Analysts surveyed by PAP Biznes expected PLN 634.6 million of profit.

title: Orlen stops Olefina III investment. It was supposed to be PLN 8 billion, but it is over PLN 50 billion
description: The Orlen Management Board has decided to stop the Olefiny III project, the concern informed in a statement. From now on, the work will be carried out as part of the New Chemistry project, in a way that allows for the rationalization of the necessary expenditures.

title: EPP MEPs call on the EC to withdraw the ban on combustion engines from 2035
description: The European People's Party Group in the European Parliament - which includes PO and PSL - called on the EC on Wednesday to withdraw the ban on the sale of cars with combustion engines from 2035. We demand a return to technological neutrality, MEP Jens Gieseke announced at a press conference in Brussels.

title: Deputy head of the European Commission: In exceptional situations, member states may suspend the right to asylum
description: The European Commission's vice-president for security and democracy, Henna Virkkunen, announced on Wednesday that EU countries, defending the security of the Union's borders, can take special measures, such as suspending the right to asylum. These measures must be exceptional and introduced temporarily, she stressed.

title: Russia's 'shadow fleet' of oil transporters targeted, Poland announces new sanctions package
description: Finance Minister Andrzej Domański said in Brussels that Poland will seek to impose further sanctions on Russia, including the 16th package aimed at illegal trade in Russian oil.

title: The Supreme Court’s Extraordinary Control Chamber upheld PiS’s complaint against the National Electoral Commission’s decision to reject the 2023 election report.
description: The Supreme Court's Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs has upheld PiS's complaint against the decision of the National Electoral Commission to reject the report of that party's committee for the 2023 elections, Supreme Court spokesman Aleksander Stępkowski said on Wednesday.

title: Investigation against former Lotos CEO dismissed. He allegedly exposed the company to losses
description: The District Prosecutor's Office in Gdańsk has discontinued the investigation into, among others, the former CEO of Grupa Lotos, Paweł Olechnowicz, who was suspected of causing significant financial damage to the company in 2011, the spokesman said on Wednesday.

title: Another government approach to the wind farm bill. It may come out of the climate ministry next week
description: The Ministry of Climate and Environment will be ready to send the draft law liberalizing distance requirements for onshore wind farms to the next stage outside the ministry next week, Minister of Climate and Environment Paulina Hennig-Kloska informed journalists.

title: Will the US abolish daylight saving time? The new Trump administration wants it
description: The US "government efficiency" advisers in the new Donald Trump administration, Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy, are in favor of completely abolishing daylight saving time across the country, the Washington Post reported on Tuesday. It recalled that the US Senate presented a plan in 2022 to make daylight saving time effective year-round.

title: Polish Nuclear Power Plant. First Reactor Launch Date Is Here
description: The update of the Polish Nuclear Power Program envisages the beginning of commercial operation of the first unit of the first Polish nuclear power plant in 2036, announced on Wednesday the government's plenipotentiary for strategic energy infrastructure, Wojciech Wrochna.

title: Media pluralism is the foundation of democracy." US ambassador to Poland speaks out after TVN decision
description: Media pluralism is the foundation of democracy. In the face of global challenges related to foreign, harmful interference, it is important for governments to take action to protect strategic infrastructure from potential threats to national security, said U.S. Ambassador to Poland Mark Brzezinski.

title: Further sanctions against Russia. EU countries have adopted the 15th package
description: Ambassadors of member states to the EU have adopted the 15th package of sanctions against Russia, an EU source told journalists in Brussels. To enter into force, it must still be supported by foreign ministers at the EU Council meeting on Monday.

title: TV Republika presenter becomes Karol Nawrocki's spokesperson
description: Emilia Wierzbicki, associated with Telewizja Republika, has become the spokeswoman for the PiS-supported presidential candidate Karol Nawrocki. The IPN president introduced her on Wednesday during a meeting with residents of Tomaszów Mazowiecki in the Łódź province.

title: Ukraine's Finance Minister: We have the means to wage war until mid-2025

title: Farmers skeptical about Mercosur deal. Brazilian beef with hormones "on the fork" of EU officials
description: The European Commission published some of the documents that make up the free trade agreement between the EU and Mercosur countries on Wednesday. The agreement includes a system that will ensure that beef imported to the EU from Brazil was produced without the use of hormones banned in the EU, the EC assured.

title: Klimczak: Start of construction of the Warsaw bypass one of the biggest challenges for the Ministry of Infrastructure
description: The commencement of construction of the Warsaw agglomeration bypass or the expansion of the railway network are the greatest challenges facing the Ministry of Infrastructure, said the head of the ministry, Dariusz Klimczak, on Wednesday during a conference summarizing the ministry's year of work.

title: Half a year with in vitro reimbursement in Poland. "Almost 7 thousand pregnancies, 20 thousand couples in the procedure
description: Thanks to the in vitro reimbursement program, 6,752 women are currently pregnant, and 20,000 couples have qualified for infertility treatment using this method, said Izabela Leszczyna, the Minister of Health, on Wednesday. After six months of the program, Poland has advanced from 42nd to 19th place in the European Infertility Treatment Atlas.

title: Record coffee prices. Wholesale prices have gone up by 80 percent, and that's not the end of the increases
description: On Tuesday, half a kilogram of Arabica was priced at $3.44 on international commodity markets. Robusta beans are also seeing similar growth in purchase costs. This means that coffee prices have risen by over 80% in 2024 alone. This, in turn, will translate into retail prices. Will coffee become a luxury alongside butter?

title: Duda and Tusk will go to Trump together [OPINION]
description: The most important area of ​​Polish policy – ​​security – was largely a continuation of what the United Right had started last year. Neither the modernization of the army, the protection of the border with Belarus, nor relations with Ukraine were subject to revision. No significant arms contracts were terminated. The South Korean direction is continued.

title: Concluding an Online Contract: What You Need to Know to Avoid Being Scammed!
description: Nowadays, more and more transactions are made online. Online shopping, digital services, subscriptions or reservations - all of this has become part of our everyday life. However, concluding a contract online involves a certain risk. In order not to be fooled, it is worth knowing the legal basis and rules that govern contracts concluded online.

title: Unconscious mistakes in your will can cost your loved ones a fortune! Find out what to avoid
description: A will is a key document in the inheritance process, allowing each person to decide independently how to divide their estate after death. Unfortunately, even minor formal errors or lack of knowledge of the rules of inheritance can lead to conflicts between heirs, invalidation of the will, and even complicated legal proceedings. In this article, we present the most common mistakes made when preparing wills and practical tips on how to avoid them.

title: Who is entitled to the widow's pension? ZUS is responsible

For this purpose, the potential beneficiary can complete a questionnaire available on the ZUS website. Who can benefit from combining the payment of a family pension with another benefit? We answer.

title: 4,500 PLN tax refund for everyone. Check what you need to do

title: Gift Tax? Check when you can get a summons from the tax office!
description: Receiving gifts is a joyful moment, but in some cases it may involve the need to settle tax formalities. The Polish tax system requires that gifts or donations received be reported to the tax office if their value exceeds certain thresholds. Failure to do so may result in a summons from the tax office or even penalties. Check when gift tax is required and how to avoid problems with the tax office.

title: Orlen stops construction of Olefin. This will save from loss of PLN 15 billion
description: Orlen's board announced today that it has halted the Olefina III investment due to excessively high costs. The company argues that this will protect it from a loss of approximately PLN 15 billion. The company's management announced that it has informed the prosecutor's office about the irregularities.

title: There is a draft of changes to the definition of mobbing ready. What could change?
description: The persistent harassment of an employee is to be a fundamental feature of the definition of mobbing, declares the Ministry of Family, Labor and Social Policy. In its opinion, this is the most important assumption of the bill, which was created in this ministry and is currently waiting to be entered into the list of legislative works of the government. It is the implementation of the announcement made by the Minister of Labor Agnieszka Dziemianowicz-Bąk in November this year regarding the clarif

title: Lunch card premium relief. Employee will have to take a photo of the receipt
description: This results from the interpretation of the ZUS branch in Gdańsk of 3 December 2024 (DI/100000/43/1101/2024). This is only the first light at the end of the tunnel, because so far, since 1 September 2023, since workplaces have had the right to finance reduced lunches for employees using prepaid cards made available to them, all applications for interpretations have been rejected.

description: ORLEN has made a strategic decision to stop the Olefin III project, which will allow the company to avoid a loss of around PLN 15 billion. This is the result of a thorough analysis of costs and irregularities in the implementation of the investment, which were reported to the prosecutor's office.

title: If the increase in duties is not temporary, no special allowance may be granted for it.
description: Can a special allowance be granted to a city hall employee who, in addition to performing tasks specified in their scope of duties, also regularly drives a company car while performing other tasks for the office? The mayor believes that the chamber's allegations are unfounded due to the principle of freedom of contract. Are we really violating the law?

description: The preventive examination program for people over 40 should be extended until the end of next year, and not only until April 2025. This is according to the comments submitted to the draft amendment to the regulation being developed by the Ministry of Health (MZ).

description: On February 24, 2022, Russia launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine. On the night of December 10-11, Ukrainians launched a missile attack on an industrial plant in the Rostov region. In turn, Ukrainian drones attacked a refinery in the Bryansk region.

description: The main currencies are rising on Wednesday afternoon. The dollar is stronger than the euro.

description: Most often, he creates portraits of people and animals. The exhibition at the Centre for Contemporary Art in Warsaw focuses on the expressive physiognomies of animals.

The company assumes that some of the Group's coal-fired power plants will go to the so-called cold reserve, but has not yet discussed this with the government. In this context, the CEO of Enea spoke about the eastern flank in the energy sector.

On Tuesday, on TVP Info, she stated that Roman Giertych would be a better minister of justice than Adam Bodnar.

description: Since the beginning of the invasion of Ukraine, at least several dozen Ukrainian traitors have been killed in attacks, as well as Russians considered war criminals by Kiev. The Kremlin is not very good at responding.

On the basis of what has already been created, a project called New Chemistry will be implemented. It is to be profitable. The new plant will start operating in 2030 at the earliest.

title: Hołownia: Polish involvement in Ukraine only under the NATO umbrella
description: Will Poland send soldiers to Ukraine as part of a potential peacekeeping mission? "Rzeczpospolita" asked Sejm Speaker Szymon Hołownia about this after his talks in Helsinki. - Only under the NATO umbrella - Hołownia replied.

title: Americans are fed up with insurers
description: The assassination of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson has sparked an unexpected wave of sympathy for the killer, Luigi Mangione. Such is the effect of the enormous costs of health insurance in the United States and the meager benefits.

title: Will the military accept a volunteer with category D?
description: The Territorial Defense Forces accept into service persons with a health category that exempts them from conscription into military service.

title: Pablo Morales did not harm PO. The National Electoral Commission did not question the expenses for the internet user
description: The National Electoral Commission has looked into the case of the famous account on the X website promoting the Civic Platform. It found no irregularities, although the way in which it reached such conclusions may be controversial.

title: The weather is preparing a big surprise. The latest IMGW forecast for 10 days
description: Christmas is only two weeks away, so many people are wondering if it will snow by then. However, the latest IMGW forecast for 10 days indicates that next week we can expect even 12 degrees, which could effectively reduce the chances of a white Christmas.

title: Mayor of Głuchołazy: Reconstruction after the flood is going smoothly
description: We cannot complain about the cooperation with the government in removing the effects of the flood. Of course, we would like more and faster, but everything is done efficiently - says the mayor of Głuchołazy Paweł Szymkowicz in an interview with "Rzeczpospolita".

title: Former RARS chief has a chance for a safe conduct letter. Court challenges prosecutor's objection
description: Michał K., former head of the Government Agency for Strategic Reserves, does not lose hope of obtaining a so-called safe conduct, which will allow him to enjoy freedom in Poland. The court of appeal has just questioned the interpretation of a provision introduced during the PiS government, which was supposed to give the prosecutor's office the final word on this matter. The game for a safe conduct begins anew.

title: Tusk: TVN and Polsat added to strategic companies protected from aggressive takeovers
description: Prime Minister Donald Tusk, during a joint press conference with Estonian Prime Minister Kristen Michal, announced that TVN and Polsat would be added to the list of strategic companies.

title: Piechna-Więckiewicz: The announcement of the Left's candidate will freshen up the atmosphere
description: It is not that easy to choose a candidate, because it always means a strategy. Each candidate has their own flaws, advantages, ratings, recognition – said Paulina Piechna-Więckiewicz, deputy minister of education and deputy chairwoman of the New Left, in an interview with Joanna Ćwiek.

title: Julia Pitera: Nobody knew Karol Nawrocki, but he had 26 percent support. This is the PiS electorate
description: Rafał Trzaskowski knows what is at stake, what is at stake for Poland - said Julia Pitera, former Secretary of State in Donald Tusk's government (2007-2011), former MP and MEP of the Civic Platform, in an interview with Radio Plus.

title: Where are the houses provided by the prime minister for the footballers of the private school? The beneficiary is in trouble
description: Nearly two million grant from Mateusz Morawiecki for the football association was spent in breach of the agreement - claims the Prime Minister's Office. The players' cottages were put up for commercial rent and changed their location.

title: Beata Szydło asked about Karol Nawrocki: There is one key issue when it comes to winning
description: None of the prosecuted politicians broke the law. This is revenge. The smear campaign exceeds all limits - this is how former Prime Minister Beata Szydło defended Marcin Romanowski, who - in her opinion - "never shied away from appearing at the prosecutor's office or giving explanations when asked to do so". On Monday, December 9, the District Court for Warsaw Mokotów decided to arrest Romanowski for three months. Beata Szydło was also asked about Karol Nawrocki, the "citizen" candidate who is r

title: Hołownia in Finland. A visit with an emphasis on safety
description: Talks on security and alliances with the Baltic Sea countries - these are the most important goals of the visit of the Speaker of the Sejm Szymon Hołownia to Helsinki, which begins on Wednesday.

title: Aleksander Kwaśniewski on Donald Tusk's year in power: We are more significant in the EU
description: I don't think that today, when it comes to price levels, there are any reasons to panic - said former president Aleksander Kwaśniewski in an interview with RMF FM.

title: Szymon Hołownia: I will not choose Karol Nawrocki in the second round of elections
description: I would not have run for president if I thought that Rafał Trzaskowski was the best solution. A large part of Poland associates him with a left turn today, and the president should be someone from the center - Szymon Hołownia, Marshal of the Sejm, leader of Poland 2050, tells "Rzeczpospolita".

title: She criticized Minister Bodnar. Prosecutor Wrzosek dismissed
description: Prosecutor Ewa Wrzosek announced on Wednesday that the head of the Ministry of Justice, Prosecutor General Adam Bodnar, had dismissed her from her delegation to the Ministry of Justice and the National Council of Prosecutors. In the Ministry of Justice, Wrzosek served as the minister's advisor for the conditions of prosecutorial service.

title: I'm keeping my fingers crossed for Donald Tusk." Beata Szydło's surprising confession
description: Beata Szydło, PiS MEP, said that she rates the current government as a one, but supports its actions in one matter. I keep my fingers crossed for Donald Tusk, so that together with President Macron they will build a coalition that will block the agreement with Mercosur - she said

title: New flight connection from Poland. A dream place to travel
description: LOT Polish Airlines will start flying from Warsaw to Reykjavik in Iceland. The connection will be launched in April 2025. In the summer, flights will be operated four days a week, and in the winter season - three. Flight time is about 4 hours.

title: PiS complaint against the decision of the National Electoral Commission. The Supreme Court issued a decision
description: The Supreme Court's Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs has upheld PiS's complaint against the National Electoral Commission's decision to reject the party's committee report for the 2023 elections, the Supreme Court spokesman said. This means that the National Electoral Commission is obliged to accept PiS's election report

title: The Minister is taking on mobbing. "We would like a simple definition." Will there be changes in labor law?
description: On Wednesday, December 11, the Sejm held a conference entitled "Mobbing is violence". - We would like to introduce a simple definition of mobbing as behavior consisting in persistent harassment of an employee - said the head of MRPiPS Angieszka Dziemianowicz-Bąk.

title: Robert Kubica in love! We know who the Polish driver is dating
description: Robert Kubica is in love. According to gossip sites, the 40-year-old is dating a Polish model. Aleksandra, because that is the name of the former Formula 1 driver's love, is followed on social media by over 100 thousand people.

title: Landowners are racing against time. Poles want to make it before the planning reform
description: From 1 January 2026, we will experience a real revolution in spatial planning. The new regulations will significantly limit the possibility of issuing decisions on development conditions. Thousands of properties that currently have investment potential may lose this status if the owners do not manage to obtain development conditions under the current rules.

title: Uneducated gang". Obajtek on Tusk's decision regarding TVN
description: As announced by Prime Minister Donald Tusk, TVN and Polsat stations will be added to the list of companies under protection. This is a reaction to rumors about the alleged sale of TVN station to a Hungarian fund linked to Viktor Orban. Tusk's announcement was commented on by Daniel Obajtek, as well as other PiS politicians.

title: Stars at Chanel's Los Angeles Party: Anderson, Wilde, Kunis [PHOTO]
description: The Academy Women’s Luncheon, organized by the fashion house Chanel, took place in Los Angeles. The event took place at the Academy Museum of Motion Pictures and its aim was to support young and talented women in the entertainment industry. Among those present were Pamela Anderson, Olivia Wilde, Mila Kunis. For the occasion, they chose clothes and accessories from the French luxury brand Chanel. See how they looked.

title: Hospital reform at a turning point? Izabela Leszczyna: I am not giving up
description: Minister Izabela Leszczyna is not giving up on the hospital reform, even though work on the project has stalled. I am definitely not giving up, she said.

title: A unique exhibition opened in Tokyo. It was dedicated to Andrzej Wajda
description: The Ministry of Culture announced that the heart of Japanese cinema, the National Film Archives of Japan, hosts a unique exhibition devoted to the work of Andrzej Wajda – a director whose films not only influenced cinematography, but also deepened the ties between Poland and Japan.

title: Ewa Błaszczyk spoke out about the scandal involving the head of the Budzik clinic. "This will be my only comment
description: For several days, there has been a lot of talk about Łukasz Grabarczyk, who is the head of the "Budzik" clinic in Olsztyn. According to the text published by journalists from Wirtualna Polska, the man was lying about his medical activities. Ewa Błaszczyk announced that she would issue a statement on the matter. "This will be my only comment," she said.

title: Stanisław Tym's funeral details have been released. Where and when will it take place?
description: Stanisław Tym died on December 6 this year. The actor passed away at the age of 87. It is already known where and when the actor who played such roles as Ryszard Ochódzki in the film "Miś" or "Rozmowa Zarządu" and Kaowiec in "Rejs" will be buried. The funeral is to take place next week.

title: The best, transparent carp jelly! It's worth practicing this perfect method before Christmas Eve
description: Carp jelly is a must-have dish in many Polish homes during the festive Christmas Eve celebration. Some eat only the jelly, others only the carp, and still others devour the whole thing with gusto. How to prepare a beautiful, clear jelly that will sparkle beautifully in the light of Christmas Eve candles?

title: Sensational discovery in Warsaw's Białołęka. An extraordinary artifact from 3 thousand years ago
description: At the end of November, an unusual archaeological artifact appeared in Legionowo – an ice axe from the Bronze Age, anonymously donated to the Historical Museum in Legionowo. The artifact, discovered in Warsaw's Białołęka in the Długa River Valley, is one of the rarest in Poland and is one of the most interesting finds of recent years.

title: Teachers' Pay Raises Too High? They've Already Crossed the Tax Threshold
description: After the pay rise, some teachers will have to pay higher taxes. This is due to the fact that they have entered the second tax bracket. Such a situation has never happened in this professional group before.

title: Universities are struggling with a serious problem. Students are dropping out of school en masse. EU funds are to help
description: The National Centre for Research and Development has announced a call for applications for the competition "Effective university management to minimize the drop-out phenomenon", which offers financial support to universities from the European Funds for Social Development (FERS) in the amount of PLN 200 million. Until when can applications be submitted?

title: Real Estate Paradox. More Construction, Fewer Apartments. Has the Brake Been Suspended?
description: In 2024, residential construction in Poland showed a surprising duality of trends. On the one hand, the number and area of ​​apartments put into use decreased compared to the previous year, while on the other hand, the number of newly started constructions and issued building permits increased.

title: Poles are betting on nuclear power. Record support for the construction of nuclear power plants
description: Poles increasingly support the construction of nuclear power plants in the country. According to the latest survey conducted on behalf of the Ministry of Industry in November 2024, as many as 92.5 percent of respondents were in favor of building such facilities.

title: Only choose oranges like this. When buying, pay attention to the "navel
description: Oranges are the fruit that we buy most often in the winter and pre-holiday season. How to choose the ones that will be sweet and juicy? It turns out that there is a foolproof way to do this. When shopping, you need to pay attention to the characteristic "navel" of this fruit.

title: New obligations for apartment owners. Here's what you'll have to do from December 23
description: A new regulation will come into force on 23 December 2024, requiring owners of apartments and hotels to install smoke and carbon monoxide detectors. The regulations aim to increase the safety of residents and protect against fires and carbon monoxide poisoning.

title: Alarming data on deaths in Poland. Dangerous dust killed 34.7 thousand people
description: Nearly 240,000 premature deaths in the European Union in 2022 were caused by air pollution with fine particulate matter PM2.5, according to a report by the European Environment Agency (EEA). The situation is worst in Poland, Germany and Italy.

title: EU support for entrepreneurs from Eastern Poland. What conditions must be met?
description: The European Funds for Eastern Poland (FEPW) program offers loans to small, medium and micro companies from the region. To date, PLN 100 million has been transferred to entrepreneurs, which are intended for the development of tourist infrastructure.

title: Additional PLN 330 for pensioners. What conditions must be met to receive this supplement? Many people confuse it with another benefit
description: The care allowance is a cash benefit granted to the elderly and disabled who need help with everyday life. From March 2024, its amount has been set at PLN 330.07 per month. Here are the details.

title: Nsame returns to training with Legia's first team. He scored 19 goals against Lugano
description: Jean-Pierre Nsame was supposed to fight for the top scorer crown in the Polish Ekstraklasa. So far, he has scored two goals for Legia Warsaw. The 31-year-old striker was sent down to the reserve team a few weeks ago. Now, Goncalo Feio has brought him back to training with the first team, which is preparing for Thursday's match in the Conference League with FC Lugano.

title: What to look for when buying a Christmas tree? The forester points out one thing
description: A fresh Christmas tree is a great decoration for your home during Christmas. It spreads a beautiful scent and creates an atmosphere that many people cannot imagine the holidays without. How to buy a Christmas tree to be sure that it is fresh and will stand for a long time? A forester has indicated what to look for.

title: How long will Ukraine have enough money to fight the war? Minister reveals
description: We have enough funds and weapons to resist Russian troops at least until the middle of next year," Ukrainian Finance Minister Serhiy Marchenko said in an interview with Spanish daily El Pais on Wednesday.

title: Questions for 1 thousand zlotys in "Millionaires". It's hard to get a score lower than 8/10 [QUIZ]
description: In the "Millionaires" program, each question brings the participants closer to the desired win, but it can just as easily cause them to drop out at a fairly low level. In this game, questions worth 1,000 PLN were often decisive, and for some participants - unfortunately, the last. Check how well you know these difficult questions that baffled the players. Time for a quiz!

title: Terlikowski: Archbishop Jędraszewski did not settle accounts with the most important
description: Why is Archbishop Marek Jędraszewski no longer a charming guy? Will the Church be stronger after Jędraszewski? How did this cleric become one of the leading figures of the Polish alternative right? What was the turning point in his life?

title: Schools have time only until December 13. Computer labs and vouchers are up for grabs
description: The new initiative "Intergenerational School" aimed at primary and secondary schools connected to the National Educational Network aims to promote intergenerational integration and digital education. The project enables students to work together with seniors, creating workshops.

title: The secret ingredient in borscht. Add a little and it will taste like grandma's
description: Red borscht is a traditional Polish dish that is served during Christmas Eve with the addition of uszka with mushrooms. The taste of borscht depends on many factors, and in many homes recipes are passed down from generation to generation. We suggest what to add to borscht to achieve the perfect taste and color. Exactly as we remember it from childhood.

title: Internet Relief 2024/2025. How much can you deduct?
description: To deduct the internet tax relief in 2024-2025, it is necessary to meet certain legal conditions. In addition, the scope of deductible costs is strictly limited. What is the limit? Here are the details.

title: Minced meatballs with rice and yellow cheese. A perfect dish for a warm dinner
description: After returning from school or work, many of us dream of eating something warm and filling. These ground meatballs may be the perfect solution. Added rice and stringy yellow cheese will make even the pickiest eater eat them with pleasure.

title: Sensational reports on the sale of TVN. Donald Tusk's decision
description: TVN and Polsat stations will be added to the list of companies under protection, Donald Tusk said. The decision was made after rumors about the alleged sale of TVN to a Hungarian fund linked to Viktor Orban appeared. "This is a very serious matter," Tusk added.

title: Are you keeping up? Another Polish crime novel is being adapted into a series
description: Platforma Max is working on more local feature productions. Soon, "Zmora" will join their ranks. The dark crime story with Magdalena Cielecka in the lead role is a series adaptation of Robert Małecki's novel of the same title. The project is directed by Łukasz Jaworski. When will the new thriller premiere?

title: Will a New State Be Established? Trump's Decision Could Change the Balance of Power
description: As we read on the Semafor website, Somaliland, an autonomous region in Somalia, has a chance of being recognized by the United States as the world's newest state when Donald Trump returns to the White House in January 2025.

title: Kinga Rusin is concerned about the situation of TVN. She speaks of "incitement as in Kurski's times
description: Kinga Rusin is currently in Cambodia. The former TVN journalist did, however, raise the issue of her former employer. According to information obtained by Onet, the station is soon to be partially owned by, among others, a Hungarian company associated with Viktor Orban. Rusin wrote about "baiting as under Kurski". What exactly did she mean?

title: QUIZ. A masterpiece of literature returns as a series. "One Hundred Years of Solitude". 15/15 will be scored by an expert
description: A masterpiece of world literature is returning as a series. Gabriel García Márquez's "One Hundred Years of Solitude" is now available on Netflix. It promises to be a huge hit! Before we start watching the series, let's recall the content of this masterpiece of Latin American literature.

title: New Hyundai now in Poland. Prices are sensational. It has 115 HP and will be a hit
description: The new Hyundai Inster debuts in Poland with two engines to choose from, in five equipment versions and at surprising prices. In addition, the 5-door newcomer stands out with an incredibly spacious interior, solid performance and a properly made cabin. How much does it cost?

title: Early retirement for people born between 1948 and 1969. There is one condition, however.
description: People born between 1949 and 1968 can apply for early retirement, provided they meet certain criteria. Retirement age is not the only requirement to receive this benefit. Here are the details.

title: Aryna Sabalenka showed off an expensive handbag. This is how much an apartment costs in Poland
description: Aryna Sabalenka is resting after the end of the season. The WTA ranking leader appeared at the Formula 1 Grand Prix in Abu Dhabi last weekend. On the Yas Marina Circuit, the Belarusian paraded with a handbag worth a fortune. Its value in Poland could buy an apartment.

title: Wizz Air under the scrutiny of the Office of Competition and Consumer Protection. Problems with baggage claims
description: The Office of Competition and Consumer Protection has brought charges against the Hungarian airline Wizz Air. They concern delays in handling complaints related to baggage damage and providing misleading information about the carrier's liability rules. The problem was highlighted by consumers who complained about the lack of contact and not receiving a response within the statutory 14-day period.

title: It made 400 million in theaters. The biggest hit is heading to VOD platform
description: The highest grossing horror film of the year, "A Quiet Place: Day One", a prequel to one of the most popular horror series of recent years, is now available in VOD rentals. However, it will appear on a subscription platform in December. On which and when?

title: The latest IMGW forecasts for winter. Something like this hasn't happened in years
description: The Institute of Meteorology and Water Management (IMGW) has presented a long-term weather forecast for the coming months. According to forecasters, this year's winter will bring measurements not seen in years. February and March are worthy of special attention, as they are expected to be warmer throughout the country than the long-term average. Here are the details.

title: New ranking of the most influential politicians in Europe. Number 1 is no longer Tusk
description: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni won this year's edition of Politico's ranking of the 28 most influential politicians in Europe. Among the nominees were also Donald Tusk, Radosław Sikorski, Rafał Trzaskowski and Piotr Serafin. What other names, apart from Poles, were at the top of the list?

title: After the S-3 sign the rule changes. 1000 PLN fine for ignorance
description: The green arrow signal S-3 informs the driver about the possibility of making a collision-free turn. This sign cannot be confused with the green arrow of a conditional right turn, but it is easy to forget that it changes an important road rule. Drivers who do not know this risk a fine of up to PLN 1,000.

title: In Krakow, they are building an aviation icon from a hundred years ago. The historic machine will be shown at the exhibition
description: Aviation enthusiasts will soon be able to admire a unique example of a legendary Polish aircraft from the 1930s. The replica is being created in the conservation workshop of the Polish Aviation Museum in Krakow and will be one of the main attractions of the new exhibition "With the wind and against the wind. Civil aviation", which is scheduled to open in autumn 2025.

title: This name was a hit in the Polish People's Republic. It means a woman who is exceptionally resourceful. Today it is fading into oblivion.
description: A woman named Teresa is self-confident, resourceful and determined to achieve her goals. This name was very popular in the times of the Polish People's Republic, but is now fading into oblivion. In 2023, only 93 girls were given it in Poland. What a pity! Teresa is a beautiful feminine name that carries a unique meaning.

title: Scandal at Christmas markets in Poland. Belarusian nuns supporting Russia in the spotlight
description: Christmas fairs in Toruń and Szczecin caused a storm when nuns from Belarus appeared at the stands representing the Saint Elizabeth Monastery in Minsk. Doubts were raised as to what the money from the sale of products could be used for.

title: A touching post by Elżbieta Romanowska. She asks for prayers
description: Elżbieta Romanowska posted a post online in which she asks fans to pray for someone very close to her. She is facing an operation that is "the biggest and most important fight.

title: Construction of a ring road, expansion of the airport and rail networks. The government has plans for Warsaw
description: The commencement of construction of the Warsaw agglomeration bypass, the expansion of the railway network and the expansion of Chopin Airport. Such plans for the capital were presented on Wednesday by the Minister of Infrastructure Dariusz Klimczak during the summary of the ministry's year of work.

title: Jacek Kurski's son allegedly raped her for the first time when she was 9 years old. She decided to talk about her trauma
description: This is not politics. This is a story about a man who should be judged fairly - says Magda N., who accuses her son Jacek Kurski of sexual abuse. He allegedly raped her for the first time when she was nine. Then again. The case went to the prosecutor's office, but during the time of Law and Justice it was dismissed twice.

title: Fewer and fewer people attend religious education classes". Despite the Church's opposition, the Ministry of National Education is introducing changes
description: The government has already decided, but the episcopate is fighting and threatening legal action. The bishops also refer to the ruling of the Constitutional Tribunal from the time of Julia Przyłębska. From September 1, 2025, there will be one religion lesson, and it will be at the beginning or end of classes.

title: Popular services outage
description: Facebook, Messenger, Instagram and WhatsApp outages. Users report problems logging in, sending messages and the inability to add posts or comments. "We are working to restore normal operation as soon as possible," reports Meta, the owner of the services.

title: Large predator fished out of ocean. Hunts in total darkness
description: A species of crustacean unknown to science has been discovered off the coast of Chile. It is the first such large animal ever found in this place - it lives in the Atacama Trench at a depth of almost 8,000 meters. Dulcibella camanchaca is also a real giant among its closest cousins.

title: Romanowski's hiding proves only one thing.
description: I don't know where Minister Romanowski is. If this is civil disobedience, I can understand it - said Michał Wójcik from the PiS club in "Kropka nad i" on TVN24, commenting on the search for Romanowski, who was ordered to be temporarily arrested. - His hiding only proves one thing - that the court made the right decision - said Barbara Dolniak from the Civic Coalition.

title: 11-year-old waited three days. Probably the only survivor
description: The humanitarian organization Compass Collective said Wednesday that 44 migrants were missing after a boat sank off the Italian island of Lampedusa. The only survivor, an 11-year-old girl who waited three days to be rescued, knew that there were 45 people on board.

title: They didn't get a prime minister. They're announcing another blockade of Wisłostrada
description: On Wednesday, they were unable to meet with Prime Minister Donald Tusk, which is why they announced the largest blockade of Wisłostrada in history for Friday. Activists of the Last Generation claim that Donald Tusk leaves them no choice.

title: Orlen withdraws from large investment. "There is a limit
description: - There is a limit to the risk taken - said Prof. Witold Orłowski from the Vistula Academy of Finance and Business in "Fakty po Faktach" on TVN24, commenting on the agreement signed by Orlen a few years ago on the construction of the Olefiny III complex. On Wednesday, the company announced that the investment would be suspended. Grażyna Piotrowska-Oliwa, former president of PGNiG, explained that all citizens will bear the costs of the bad decisions made earlier.

title: Deputy Minister of Justice on Wrzosek's words: my hair stood on end
description: - Prosecutor Ewa Wrzosek submitted her resignation today and this resignation was accepted by Minister Adam Bodnar. The delegation to the Ministry of Justice has been withdrawn - Deputy Minister of Justice Zuzanna Rudzińska-Bluszcz said in "Fakty po Faktach". She said that this decision was not caused by Wrzosek's recent statement in the media. She also considered Wrzosek's words from this conversation to be "disturbing" that "these are not times to strictly adhere to the letter of the law".

title: Israeli attack on Syrian port of Latakia. Before and after photos
description: Israeli forces attacked the Syrian port of Latakia on Monday. Satellite images show the port before and after the attack. "The navy carried out an operation last night with great success to destroy the Syrian fleet," Israeli Defense Minister Israel Katz said in a statement.

title: Our tractors behaved as if possessed by a demon
description: Solar activity makes it difficult for... farmers to work. This is due to the impact of geomagnetic storms on GPS systems. In situations where a solar storm occurs during the sowing or harvesting season, agricultural work can be interrupted for several days.

title: Kaczyński comments on the Supreme Court's decision
description: The President of Law and Justice commented on today's decision of the Supreme Court's Extraordinary Control Chamber. Jarosław Kaczyński stated that "the question remains whether the current government will implement it". The matter was also commented on by PiS and KO politicians in the "Tak jest" program on TVN24.

title: Dark clouds over the industry. Appeal for EU ban
description: - We demand a return to technological neutrality - MEP Jens Gieseke announced at a press conference in Brussels. The European People's Party Group in the European Parliament - which includes the Civic Platform and the Polish People's Party - called on the European Commission on Wednesday to withdraw the ban on the sale of cars with combustion engines from 2035.

title: It will accommodate over 150 trams. The new depot is being commissioned
description: The facility is being commissioned at Annopol, where the first trams arrived in the autumn, on the day the tram route to Miasteczko Wilanów was opened. Tram drivers are considering the concept of building a second access road to the depot from the north.

title: Tomorrow's weather - Thursday 12.12. Ahead of us is a night of clouds and snow
description: Weather for tomorrow, Thursday, 12.12. Snow will fall overnight in almost all parts of the country. There will be less precipitation during the day, and the sky may clear up. Thermometers will show up to 4 degrees Celsius.

title: Another balloon flew into Polish territory. Lithuanian arrested
description: A 52-year-old Lithuanian is suspected of smuggling cigarettes using weather balloons. The man was caught near Moniek in Podlasie, when he was using a locator to find a package containing 1,500 packs of illegal cigarettes. He will be held accountable in court for his participation in smuggling.

title: Prosecutor Wrzosek: I was recalled today from my delegation to the ministry and the National Council of Prosecutors
description: I was recalled today from my delegation to the Ministry of Justice and the National Council of Prosecutors at the Prosecutor General," said prosecutor Ewa Wrzosek. She added that it was Adam Bodnar's decision. The Prosecutor General's spokeswoman, Anna Adamiak, explained in an interview with tvn24.pl that the minister had accepted the request to recall me from the delegation, submitted by the prosecutor herself.

title: Product withdrawn from stores. Warning
description: The Chief Sanitary Inspectorate has issued a warning regarding a batch of herring with leek. "The product indicated in the message should not be consumed," it said.

title: North Korea criticizes 'gangster' South
description: North Korean media has accused South Korean President Jun Suk Jeol of imposing a "dictatorship over his own people" and labeled his country a "gangster state." It is the first official response by North Korea, a communist dictatorship, to a political crisis that has erupted since a failed attempt to impose martial law in the South.

title: Car on fire at gas station, fire extinguished by workers
description: On Wednesday afternoon, a car caught fire at a gas station in Warsaw's Grochów district. The fire was extinguished thanks to the quick response of employees. The fire department reported that no one was hurt.

title: What were Max users most likely to watch in 2024? Two Polish productions in the lead
description: The ranking of the most popular productions in Poland on the Max service in 2024 is opened by the series "The Dragon's House". But Polish series also ranked very high. "Skazana" with Agata Kulesza in the main role took sixth place, and "Odmyśl" with Katarzyna Wajda - eighth.

title: PiS Financial Report. Decision of the Unrecognized Chamber of the Supreme Court
description: The Supreme Court's Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs upheld PiS's appeal against the National Electoral Commission's decision to reject the party's financial report from the parliamentary elections. This chamber is being questioned by some legal experts and European tribunals. Earlier, the National Electoral Commission filed a motion to exclude the judges adjudicating in this case, which was rejected.

title: The Prime Minister revealed the details of the arrangements with Zelensky. "A visit at an important moment
description: - Together with the president of Ukraine, we have arranged a visit and a return visit - announced Prime Minister Donald Tusk. The head of the Chancellery of the Prime Minister informed that he will visit Kiev at the beginning of 2025, while Volodymyr Zelensky will come to our country at an important moment.

title: Polsat and TVN on the strategic list. Prime Minister's declaration
description: TVN and Polsat television stations will be included in the list of strategic companies that are subject to protection, said Donald Tusk at a conference on Wednesday.

title: Wizz Air under the scrutiny of the Office of Competition and Consumer Protection. It's about luggage
description: Wizz Air Hungary has been charged with violating the collective interests of consumers. The carrier must take appropriate corrective action. This is all because of consumer complaints about the process of handling complaints about damaged baggage. People have reported en masse that, among other things, they do not receive a response to their reports.

title: Be careful what you throw in the bin. New regulations and penalties from January
description: Plastic goes in the yellow container, glass in the green one, paper in the blue one, bio-waste in the brown one, and mixed waste in the black one. Even adults have trouble assessing where certain waste groups should go. This is the case with clothing and textiles. Until now, they could be thrown into the mixed waste container. This will change in 2025.

title: Warsaw drivers are terrified. New speed camera breaks records
description: It is less than a month old and has already taken almost eight thousand photos. One of the most modern speed cameras in the country may soon become the most hated by drivers. Thanks to advanced technology, it is able to detect excessive speed of even several cars at the same time, as many travelers have already learned.

title: Tragic road accident. Car in flames, 58-year-old priest dies
description: Father Tadeusz Bielecki died in a tragic accident. The car driven by the 58-year-old priest hit a truck and burst into flames. - The truck driver pulled the priest out of the burning vehicle. Unfortunately, the man died on the spot - said a spokeswoman for the local police. The priest gave good teachings, he was a man of character - wrote firefighters from the Volunteer Fire Department in Mniów.

title: The savannah sitatunga runs through the forests in northern Poland. An important appeal from the foundation
description: A savanna sitatunga runs through the forests near Węgorzewo. It is an exotic species of antelope that does not naturally occur in Poland. A few months ago, the animal escaped from a mini zoo, and the owner has not managed to locate it so far. Winter and the upcoming frosts can be deadly for the antelope, which is why the Kopytka Foundation has issued an important appeal with hope.

title: Jarosław Kaczyński in the prosecutor's office. In the background a letter from years ago
description: Jarosław Kaczyński appeared at the prosecutor's office, where he is to testify as a witness in an investigation concerning the Justice Fund. This concerns a 2019 letter that he wrote to the then Minister of Justice Zbigniew Ziobro. After more than an hour, the PiS leader left the prosecutor's office building.

title: China blocks imports from Poland, fearing a dangerous disease
description: The General Administration of Customs of China has blocked the import of ruminants and animal products from Poland and Croatia. The decision is dictated by the appearance of bluetongue disease in these countries. Veterinary services on the Vistula have recorded two such outbreaks.

title: Poles Asked About Climate Change: A New Trend Is Visible
description: The number of people concerned about climate change is decreasing. Changes are visible not only on the international market, but also in our country. Poles are less and less interested in the climate crisis and environmental threats. This may be partly related to the protests and actions of the Last Generation. Activists have repeatedly blocked streets, making it difficult for others to pass, which has caused frustration in Poles.

title: Adam Bodnar reacts strongly to prosecutor Wrzosek. "I would expect loyalty
description: - I received the words of prosecutor Wrzosek with a slight surprise - said Minister of Justice Adam Bodnar when asked about the prosecutor's statement, who said that Roman Giertych would be a better minister of justice. - There are principles in professional relations, such as loyalty. If there are any reservations, they are mentioned to the boss - he added. As he said, he did not have such a conversation.

title: Lotto Results for December 10, 2024. Check Your Winnings
description: On Tuesday, December 10, 2024, the draws for the number games run by Totalizator Sportowy took place. Which numbers turned out to be lucky? Here are the results of the draw: Ekstra Pensja, Ekstra Premia, EuroJackpot, Kaskada, Lotto, Lotto Plus, Mini Lotto, Multi Multi.

title: They wanted to improve their beauty. The treatments ended badly
description: The tragedy of women who wanted to improve their looks a bit, and ended up on operating tables. Both ended up in the same aesthetic cosmetology clinic in Poznań. They were convinced that a female doctor was taking care of them. Nothing could be further from the truth. Intervention Material.

title: Scandal in the Sosnowiec diocese. There are new charges against priest Jacek K.
description: Father Jacek K. has been charged with two new offences of abusing minors. The priest from the Sosnowiec diocese is one of the suspects in the proceedings conducted by the District Prosecutor's Office there. In total, Jacek K. was supposed to have committed four such crimes, according to investigators.

title: 18-year-old buys BMW. Rolls it over a few dozen minutes later
description: An 18-year-old from Mazovia was enjoying her BMW for about an hour. While driving her new purchase home, she lost control of the car and rolled over. The police said the teenager was very lucky.

title: Facebook, Messenger and Instagram outage. Mass reports
description: Users of Meta's applications are massively reporting outages that started shortly before 7 p.m. The problems affect Facebook, Messenger and Instagram, according to information from Downdetecor.

title: Heated discussion in the Polsat studio. "You are more important than the court
description: - The court says otherwise. I understand that you are more important than the court - said Michał Moskal, referring to the words of Dariusz Joński. Politicians from opposite sides of the political scene had a lively discussion at the Szubartowicz Point of View about the decision of the Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs Chamber of the Supreme Court, which accepted the PiS complaint against the August resolution of the National Electoral Commission.

title: She paid the price". Zgorzelski comments on the decision regarding Wrzosek
description: - Subordinates should not criticize their boss. Ewa Wrzosek paid the price for this criticism - this is how the deputy speaker of the Sejm from PSL Piotr Zgorzelski commented on Adam Bodnar's decision to dismiss the prosecutor. According to the politician, Wrzosek has his own views and can now express them. - Donald Tusk trusts Adam Bodnar - emphasized Zgorzelski.

title: Will Russia Use More Dangerous Weapons Again? "In the Coming Days
description: American intelligence believes that Russia may launch the Oreshnik ballistic missile towards Ukraine again in the coming days, AP reported, citing US administration officials. Washington believes that the use of the Oreshnik is an attempt to intimidate Kiev. Moscow is said to have only a few missiles of this type in its arsenal. The Russians first used it in an attack on the city of Dnipro.

title: Bodnar's decisive move towards Wrzosek. "I was dismissed today
description: I do not know whether the dismissal is the result of taking into account the applications submitted by me to resign from the functions entrusted to me or a completely separate decision of MS PG - said Ewa Wrzosek, referring to the decision of Adam Bodnar to dismiss her from the delegation to the Ministry of Justice and the National Council of Prosecutors at the Prosecutor General

title: PiS financial report rejected. There is a decision on millions for the party
description: The Supreme Court's Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs, unrecognized by the government, among others, upheld PiS's complaint against the August resolution of the National Electoral Commission to reject the party's election committee report on the 2023 parliamentary elections. - The NEC's resolution does not meet the legality criterion - explained the Supreme Court's spokesman, judge Aleksander Stępkowski. The Chamber's decision was commented on online by Jarosław Kaczyński.

title: Mold and mildew in apartments. Cooperative wants expensive heating
description: Historic 120-year-old tenement houses in Zawiercie are falling into ruin, but the housing cooperative is forcing the tenants to install expensive electric heating. The buildings are already damp, moldy and difficult to heat. The tenants want to join the housing cooperative for a gas installation, but it refuses. Intervention Material.

title: A restless night is coming. Warning for almost half of Poland
description: Freezing precipitation and icing await residents of southern, eastern and central Poland. IMGW has issued warnings for a total of 10 provinces. The alerts will be in effect from Wednesday evening.

title: Historic Coffee Price Increase: Customers Will Feel It in 2025
description: Coffee prices have skyrocketed and reached record levels. Experts indicate that the price of coffee beans has increased by over 80 percent. Although companies assure us that they have the consumer's best interests in mind, they are already revealing that they will raise the prices of their products next year, and it will be consumers who will feel the brunt of this.

title: Darek the carpenter changes the TV colors. He joins the cult program
description: Dariusz Wardziak, known as Darek Stolarz, has chosen a new path and is starting work at Polsat! The handyman, beloved by Poles, has been designing and creating furniture for 30 years. What challenges await him in the program Nasz nowy dom, which he has just joined?

title: Luxury car crashed in Warsaw. Driver was driving against traffic
description: Moments of terror on Trasa Toruńska in Warsaw. The driver of a luxury Chevrolet Corvette fainted at the wheel and hit the guardrails, then began driving against traffic. He ended his drive only after a head-on collision with a bus. A total of four vehicles were involved in the incident, and a 21-year-old man was taken to hospital.

title: Germany declares support for Syria. Promises millions
description: - We see a moment of hope - said German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock, commenting on the situation in Syria. She also announced an additional 8 million euros (over 34 million złoty) for humanitarian aid. Baerbock added that the foreign ministers of several European countries will discuss Syria and Syrian refugees during a meeting in Berlin on Thursday.

title: They got the desired pay rises, but another problem arose. "This is how the tax system works
description: Teachers received their desired pay rises, but another problem has arisen. Every sixth of them has exceeded the second tax bracket, which means they will pay higher taxes. Teachers are demanding relief or threatening not to take any more overtime. The topic was publicized by the Interia portal.

title: Polish Ministry of Foreign Affairs responds to events in Russia. "Note delivered
description: - A note regarding the vandalism of the AK soldiers' memorial sites has been submitted to the Russian side - said Paweł Wroński, spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, on Wednesday. The Polish side demands explanations and the detection and punishment of the perpetrators of the vandalism of the AK soldiers' memorial site in Borowicze-Jogła. Russia's response is pending.

The head of the Chancellery of the Prime Minister informed that he will visit Kiev at the beginning of 2025, while Volodymyr Zelensky will come to our country at an important moment.

This is all because of consumer complaints about the process of handling complaints about damaged baggage. People have reported en masse that, among other things, they do not receive a response to their reports.

description: Plastic goes in the yellow container, glass in the green one, paper in the blue one, bio-waste in the brown one, and mixed waste in the black one. Even adults have trouble assessing where certain waste groups should go. This is the case with clothing and textiles. Until now, they could be thrown into the mixed waste container. This will change in 2025.

Their manufacturers are bound by strict rules that they must follow in order for this food to reach our tables. However, it turns out that almost half of them have problems fulfilling their obligations. They did not escape punishment.

Earlier, the head of the Hungarian government visited the US, where he met with President-elect Donald Trump. The conversation was also supposed to concern the situation in Ukraine.

In addition, explosions were reported in Taganrog on the Sea of ​​Azov. Kiev most likely wanted to destroy the military airport there.

Although they were supposed to be an alternative, they also arouse many emotions.

"This attack requires a clear and decisive response," he said.

The support was supposed to be provided to weaken Russia and its Syrian allies. The newspaper emphasizes that Ukraine's contribution was not crucial, but at least to a small extent helped to overthrow Russia's most important client in the Middle East.

As he argued, it was a peace mission related to the issue of ending the war in Ukraine.

When the employees of the showroom told him that it was impossible to return the car, he decided to take a crazy step. The man got behind the wheel and drove violently into the glass wall of the building, smashing it into small pieces. It all happened in one of the American states.

description: Krakow turns out to be more expensive than Warsaw in terms of prices in central districts. In the Stare Miasto district, the average price of apartments put up for sale in the third quarter of 2024 exceeded PLN 1 million. In the capital, the average price for all premises put up for sale is "only" PLN 990,430. For comparison, the most expensive district among the eight cities studied is Orłowo in Gdynia, where the average price is as much as PLN 1.61 million - according to a report by Rankomat.p

description: The EC has approved the payment of PLN 40 billion from the second and third payment application from the KPO; the transfer will reach Poland for the holidays - said Jan Szyszko, Deputy Minister of Funds, on Wednesday. He added that another KPO review will probably begin at the turn of January and February 2025.

description: Serious accident on Trasa Toruńska in Warsaw. On the lane towards Marki in the tunnel behind Łabiszyńska, a sports car driven by a 21-year-old collided head-on with three other vehicles. The driver had previously lost consciousness and was driving against traffic. It's a miracle that no one was hurt.

title: Marcin Romanowski still at large. Police search

The former deputy minister of justice suspected in the Justice Fund scandal is to be taken into custody in accordance with the court's decision.

title: She criticized Minister Bodnar. Prosecutor Wrzosek informs about his decision
description: Prosecutor Ewa Wrzosek announced on Wednesday that the head of the Ministry of Justice, Prosecutor General Adam Bodnar, had dismissed her from her delegation to the Ministry of Justice and the National Council of Prosecutors. In the Ministry of Justice, Wrzosek served as the minister's advisor for conditions of prosecutorial service.

title: A difficult coalition, but with successes. Hołownia summed up a year of government
description: The Speaker of the Sejm, Szymon Hołownia, referring to the year of the coalition government, assessed that there is no reason to celebrate. "We have a reason to roll up our sleeves even more and get down to work, because at the halfway point of this term we will have to show people a higher percentage of fulfilled promises," he said.

title: Święczkowski plans talks on the Constitutional Tribunal. Invitations will be sent by the end of the week
description: The President of the Constitutional Tribunal, Bogdan Święczkowski, declares that he wants to reach a compromise in the functioning of the institution entrusted to him. He announced that invitations to talks on this matter will be sent by the end of the week.

title: Premature euphoria of PiS? Categorical declaration regarding the Supreme Court
description: The Ministry of Finance has no intention of recognizing the decision of the Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs of the Supreme Court regarding Law and Justice. This concerns Wednesday's decision regarding the payment of subsidies to PiS.

title: Accident at Poznań's Apollo cinema. Woman seriously injured
description: During a performance at the Apollo cinema in Poznań, a serious accident occurred. A piece of scenography fell on a woman, causing serious injuries. The injured woman was taken to hospital. The police are investigating the circumstances of the incident.

title: Awful crime against Sara. Court makes decision on Polish woman's daughter
description: On Wednesday, a London court found the father and stepmother of 10-year-old Sara Sharif guilty of her murder. The incident, which took place on August 8, 2023, caused a stir among the British. The investigation found that the girl had been subjected to brutal actions and torture before her death. Sara was the daughter of a Polish mother and a Pakistani man.

title: Former South Korean Defense Minister in custody after attempting to kill himself
description: Kim Jong Hyun, former South Korean defense minister, attempted suicide while in custody. The politician was detained in connection with the declaration of martial law by Seoul.

title: Zelensky explained. He is ready to make such concessions

title: Understandable for every patriot". Tusk hit PiS
description: Protecting Polish media from Russian hostile takeover seems to be an obvious need of the hour. It is understandable to every patriot," Donald Tusk said in the post. "So why did PiS politicians get so furious after the announcement of this decision?" he added.

title: Ukraine is in turmoil. Parents are ready to take teenagers out of the country
description: Experts from the Ukrainian General Staff warned in the media that the current rate of mobilization does not cover the losses suffered on the front. This is one of the arguments for lowering the age of people subject to mobilization to 18. The country was in uproar when US officials put President Zelensky before this dramatic choice.

According to experts, Israel took advantage of the chaos following the rebel takeover and decided to take "preemptive action.

description: Netflix has released a trailer for the series "Wzgórze pies," an adaptation of Jakub Żulczyk's novel of the same name. The main roles are played by Robert Więckiewicz and Mateusz Kościukiewicz. The series' premiere date has also been revealed.

title: Big changes at Rochstar. New managing director talks about the company's plans
description: Andrzej Mytych has become the managing director and vice-president of the production company Rochstar - as established by the portal Wirtualnemedia.pl. Rochstar is now focusing on its own formats, has started producing for streaming platforms and has also moved to a new headquarters.

title: More cuts at AXN. Broadcaster in Poland without a programming director
description: Agnieszka Zawadzka-Jopek, who took over as programming manager for AXN channels on the Polish market in March, announced that her contract was being terminated. She explained that Antenna Entertainment wants to continue its operations in our country without the position of programming manager.

The Titanium Clip for "Best in the competition" went to the agency 38 Content Communication. For the first time, the Crystal Clip was awarded for exemplary client tender practices - it went to Unilever. The title of PR Star was honored to Magdalena Brzezińska, who is responsible for communication of Grupa Żywiec.

title: Will sailors get a big present under the Christmas tree? This is a long-awaited ship
description: In mid-November, the Armament Agency confirmed that it had launched the procedure for acquiring a rescue ship for the "Ratownik" program. This is the third attempt at this program. Perhaps the old saying "third time's a charm" will prove true and this time it will have a happy ending. This is the voice coming from the Polish armaments industry.

title: Trump sets dangerous conditions for Europe. Is Poland calm? "It's a facade
description: Donald Trump, while still the US president, has repeatedly stressed the need for European countries to increase their spending on defence. He repeated this in an interview with NBC, saying that Europeans need to start treating the US fairly. He also added that if Europe does not do this, he will consider leaving NATO.

title: Russia Gives North Korea Dangerous Weapons? This Is Payment for Fighting Ukraine
description: American military commanders believe that Russia and North Korea have concluded a secret agreement in which, in exchange for sending troops to the Ukrainian front, Kim Jong-un demanded supplies of Russian Su-27 and MiG-29 fighters. He is also said to demand access to submarine construction technology.

title: The crisis in Romania is a great lesson for Europe. "It worries us
description: Romanian court invalidates presidential elections. After this decision, the winner of the first round, Calin Georgescu, stated that "the corrupt system made a pact with the devil". The events in Romania must be a lesson for other countries.

title: The End of Russia's Bastion in Syria. What About Military Bases?
description: The overthrow of Bashar al-Assad significantly weakens Russia's influence in the Middle East. Moscow was, after all, the main sponsor and defender of the Syrian regime, alongside Tehran.

title: This defense system could turn our tanks into fortresses. We are still delaying. Armor alone is not enough
description: EuroTrophy GmbH has received an order from KNDS Deutschland for the delivery of Trophy HV active vehicle protection system kits for 123 German Leopard 2A8 tanks. The number of users of such solutions is growing. However, Poland is not among them...

title: Europe must take care of its own security, without looking at the US and Trump
description: Polish authorities are working on creating a new security strategy. This is necessary because the world is becoming an increasingly unfriendly place. So what will determine our security? We talk about this with Dr. Hab. Agnieszka Bieńczyk-Missala, professor at the University of Warsaw.

title: K2 Tank Deliveries in Danger? Korea's Post-Martial Law Confusion
description: Last week's short-lived martial law in South Korea may also affect Poland - specifically, its arms purchases from that country. Let us recall: the Polish Army is ordering K2 tanks, K9 howitzers, rocket launchers and FA-50 aircraft from that country. Korean media indicate that equipment deliveries may be delayed.

title: We understand and accept spending on tanks, but not on these things. The head of the National Security Bureau on the huge funds
description: We are as a society ready to spend huge amounts of money on armaments if it involves the delivery of new tanks or missiles; however, it is difficult to explain to the society the costs associated with, for example, storing ammunition or training - noted on Monday the head of the National Security Bureau, Jacek Siewiera.
