title: The head of the National Security Bureau on the coup in Syria: from Poland's point of view, I see many potential threats here
description: It is worth paying attention to two issues here - the military and political dimension, because in both - I have the impression - the optimism associated with the belief that this is a great defeat of the Russian Federation is too far-reaching. This form of optimism can be maintained by global powers" - emphasized the Head of the National Security Bureau Jacek Siewiera during Monday's edition of the program "Fakty po faktach" on TVN24. "From the point of view of regional security and Polish inte

title: Head of the National Security Bureau: a defense ministry should be established in Poland
description: We are as a society ready to spend huge amounts of money on armaments if it involves the delivery of new tanks or missiles. However, it is difficult to explain to society the costs associated with storing ammunition or training, noted the head of the National Security Bureau Jacek Siewiera on Monday. As he pointed out, he is convinced of the need to establish an armaments ministry in Poland, similar to DAPA in South Korea or SSB in Turkey.

title: BBN chief: Russia is currently unable to conduct operations in many theaters
description: The coup in Syria, the fall of the regime is a message to global powers that the Russian Federation - with its involvement in Ukraine - is not able to conduct operations in many theaters - assessed the Head of the National Security Bureau Jacek Siewiera. During the conference entitled "Lessons from the war in Ukraine - equipment and structure of the Polish army and Civil Defense" he also spoke about the situation in Syria.

title: The head of the National Security Bureau on the consequences of the fall of the Syrian regime for Poland's security
description: After the phase of dynamic events that have taken place in Syria in recent days, each country must ask itself how this situation translates into its direct security interests," said the Head of the National Security Bureau, Jacek Siewiera, in TOK FM. "And this perspective is much less optimistic than what is described in the global dimension, for the big players," he emphasized.

title: Bus collides with tram in Wrocław. There are injured people
description: A tram collided with a public transport bus in Wrocław. Four people were slightly injured in the accident. The police reported traffic disruptions.

title: Volodymyr Zelensky spoke with Donald Tusk. He revealed the background
description: The President of Ukraine reported that he spoke with Donald Tusk by phone. I thanked him for his unwavering support of friendly Poland, Volodymyr Zelensky said. The politicians also agreed on mutual visits in the near future.

title: Butter prices up sharply. Expert cites two main factors
description: - We were so keen on this butter, and when we look at the inflation readings, we can see that sugar has become significantly cheaper - noted Anna Gołębicka from the Adam Smith Center. In Jankowski's Point of View, she explained that we pay more for fat in cubes because in the summer - due to drought - cows could not give as much milk as they usually did. The situation was also worsened by New Zealand's decision.

title: The Fashion Center is located in Sosnowiec. A unique place has been created
description: Are we facing the decline of the popularity of creations from Milan or Paris? Their place may be taken by... Sosnowiec. The city has outlined serious plans to become a recognizable point on the fashion map of the world. Students who will be educated in the first Fashion Center in Poland are to help with this.

title: The Last Generation wrote a letter to Poles. "A chronic state of emergency
description: The government should take action comparable to the Marshall Plan, say activists from the Last Generation, who have been blocking the streets of Warsaw for some time now. In their opinion, the threats resulting from the climate catastrophe will result in a permanent state of emergency. In an open letter, they appealed for solidarity and stated that the Polish authorities are consciously fueling the crisis.

title: Mysterious disease in Africa. There is a special GIS announcement
description: The Chief Sanitary Inspectorate warns of a mysterious disease spreading in the Democratic Republic of Congo. As a result, dozens of people, especially young ones, have died. In turn, the World Health Organization has sent experts to the site to diagnose the disturbing phenomenon.

title: Freezing electricity prices. Andrzej Duda decides the fate of the bill
description: The President signed 10 laws on Tuesday, including an amendment to freeze electricity prices, the Chancellery of the President of the Republic of Poland reported. Other projects that were recognized included assistance to persons entitled to alimony, foreign service, ammunition production, and promoting electricity generation in offshore wind farms.

title: Meat-cutting brawl leaves 43-year-old dead
description: Police officers from Lubartów, Lublin, detained a 54-year-old woman who killed her partner. According to investigators, the man did not want to help her cut up the meat. A row ensued, during which the woman stabbed the 43-year-old. His life could not be saved.

title: Tragic series of poisonings in Poland. Alarming results of inspections
description: Buyers without permission, knowledge gained from the Internet and sellers who do not check permits - this is the result of the control of the fumigants market, carried out by the Plant Protection and Seed Inspectorate. It was initiated after a tragic series of poisonings among children. In this case, Deputy Minister of Agriculture Michał Kołodziejczak filed a notice to the prosecutor's office.

title: Antoni Macierewicz arrested behind the wheel. "He claimed immunity
description: Antoni Macierewicz was arrested on Tuesday behind the wheel of a car, although it was previously reported that the PiS politician would lose his driving license. The spokesman for the Ministry of the Interior and Administration, Jacek Dobrzyński, commented on the case. The MP claimed immunity and refused to submit to a road check and a sobriety test, he said, adding that in such a situation, the police refrained from further action.

title: Bat on patostreams. Krzysztof Gawkowski announces serious changes
description: - This is a spin to avoid responsibility - this is how Krzysztof Gawkowski assessed in Gość Wydarzeń the fact that Marcin Romanowski did not appear in court. The Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Digital Affairs also spoke about how the government wants to limit minors' access to harmful content on the web, including patostreams. - This week we will present the first legislative acts - he announced.

title: The Act on the Liquidation of the Central Anticorruption Bureau. There is a government decision, Donald Tusk announces
description: On Tuesday, the government adopted a draft law on the liquidation of the Central Anticorruption Bureau. - None of us has any doubts that what has happened to this service in recent years has been a mockery of the mission for which it was established - emphasized Prime Minister Donald Tusk. The current CBA is to be replaced by a new division in the police: the Central Anticorruption Bureau.

title: Bogdan Święczkowski appeals to the authorities. He wants talks with, among others, Donald Tusk
description: Bogdan Święczkowski, the new president of the Constitutional Tribunal, announced meetings with the most important people in the country. As he calculated, he wants to talk about the functioning of the Constitutional Tribunal with the Prime Minister, the Marshals of the Sejm and Senate, and the President of the National Bank of Poland. He also referred to comments that he became the head of the Tribunal, although in the past he was associated with PiS. - I have never been an MP - Święczkowski sta

title: Antoni Macierewicz behind the wheel. The police stopped his car. "I didn't lose my driving license
description: Antoni Macierewicz was arrested behind the wheel of a car, although it had been previously reported that the PiS MP would lose his driving license. "I have not received (this) document. When I receive it, I will immediately cash it," he said in an interview with a Polsat News reporter. Earlier, in front of the Smolensk monument, there were scuffles between Macierewicz, activists and police.

title: Investigation into Jacek Kurski's son. Donald Tusk turns to Adam Bodnar
description: - There will be no impunity for those who despise the suffering of children who are victims of sexual violence - said Prime Minister Donald Tusk. He noted that he will ask the Prosecutor General for information on the double discontinuation of the investigation into Zdzisław Antoni K., son of a prominent PiS politician - Jacek Kurski.

title: Emmanuel Macron will visit Poland. Donald Tusk confirms
description: - Emmanuel Macron will visit Warsaw - said Prime Minister Donald Tusk at a government meeting. As he revealed, the visit is to take place on Thursday. - Poland assumes leadership in the European Union from January 1 in a very dramatic situation - he said. The Prime Minister added that the government will adopt priorities for the presidency of the EU Council.

title: He was doing push-ups in the street. A Fiat ran over him.
description: He walked in the middle of the road, lay down in front of oncoming cars and did push-ups in the middle of the street until one of the vehicles hit him. When the police arrived, the 43-year-old complained that he had been hit. It turned out that he was drunk.

title: Police practiced at shooting range. Woman hit in the head
description: The woman was probably wounded in the head by a bullet. A nearby shooting range was conducting exercises with police officers, and the object that hit the 53-year-old could have been a ricochet. The case is being investigated by police and prosecutors. The woman is not in danger.

title: After a visit to the service, the tractor stopped working. It is worth 800 thousand PLN
description: A farmer from Podlasie spent PLN 800,000 on a new tractor that worked for only a month. Grzegorz Krom claims that the problems started when he took the machine to an authorized dealer to install a front linkage. In his opinion, the electronics have been failing ever since. The dealer claims that the farmer himself is to blame, because he was working with the tractor... in mud. Intervention Material.

title: Kaczyński at the Smolensk monthly commemoration. "The state is helpless against the agents
description: - We are dealing here with permanent violation of the law also by the current government. The previous ones kept this group of troublemakers and agents away from us, unfortunately this is not the case now - said Jarosław Kaczyński during the Smolensk monthly commemoration at Piłsudski Square.

title: He pretended to be his brother. He got caught because the police looked under the windshield wiper.
description: The 36-year-old's problems began with a simple speeding violation, for which he was stopped by the Wrocław traffic police. A police check revealed more irregularities. Not only was the man driving under the influence of alcohol, he had a lifetime driving ban and tried to pass himself off as his brother, but the car also had false license plates.

title: How much does a Christmas tree cost from the State Forests? The cheapest offers are surprising
description: When deciding to buy a Christmas tree from the State Forests, we will pay from about PLN 40 to PLN 130 for a Christmas tree. The cost is made up of the type of plant, its height, but also the place of purchase, because forest districts set prices individually.

title: PiS with a narrow advantage. The latest poll
description: The largest political groups in Poland have similar support, but in the latest poll, PiS is on top. Although the advantage is minimal, about 0.3 percentage points, Jarosław Kaczyński's party has taken the lead.

title: They got a beating when it comes to communication". Radosław Fogiel on the KO convention
description: - Generally, the accusation is that the organizations that were not supported were those that today's government would like. Because if you support left-wing organizations, Rafał Trzaskowski supports the LGBT museum, then it's OK - Radosław Fogiel argued, commenting on the decision to arrest Marcin Romanowski. The MP indicated that the actions against the politician are of a political nature.

title: What about religious education classes in schools? Church announces legal action
description: Government representatives failed to reach an agreement with the Episcopate on religious education in schools. The Polish Episcopal Conference announced in a statement that it would take further legal steps. The statement also emphasized that the proposed changes would lead to the destruction of the religious education system.

title: Lotto Results for December 9, 2024. Check Your Winnings
description: On Monday, December 9, 2024, the draws for the number games run by Totalizator Sportowy took place. Which numbers turned out to be lucky? Here are the results of the draw: Ekstra Pensja, Ekstra Premia, Kaskada, Mini Lotto, Multi Multi.

title: Will the president have an impact on butter prices? "Mental decline
description: - Minister Szłapka's statement in the context of what Rafał Trzaskowski will potentially do with the prices of various products is only a demonstration of mental degradation - PiS MP Olga Semeniuk-Patkowska stated in the Gozdyra Debate. The ongoing presidential pre-campaign is accompanied by a heated discussion on the price of butter.

title: Tragedy on the highway near Krakow. 80-year-old woman dies
description: A woman has died after being hit by a truck on the A4 motorway near Krakow. The road towards Katowice is blocked. Emergency services are working on the scene.

title: Travels with Polish Radio for Abroad. Museum of King Jan III's Palace in Wilanów
description: Travels with Polish Radio for Abroad. Museum of King Jan III's Palace in Wilanów

title: Poles in South America. "We want to cultivate Polish roots
description: Poles in South America. "We want to cultivate Polish roots

title: 15th Anniversary of the Polish Family Support Centre in Edinburgh
description: 15th Anniversary of the Polish Family Support Centre in Edinburgh

title: Only 3 km left. The Russians are approaching inexorably
description: Russian troops are now just 3 km from Pokrovsk, CNN reports, citing DeepState, a service that tracks the situation on the front in Ukraine and maps it on its own maps. These reports are confirmed by the Ukrainian army.

title: Zygmunt Solorz speaks out after the "Wyborcza" article. "The nervous reactions of my children and their advisors
description: - It is not true that any court has blocked my assets - Zygmunt Solorz issued a statement on Tuesday regarding our publication.

title: Święczkowski wants a "compromise". First conference of the new president of the Constitutional Tribunal
description: - I would like to hold talks with people who have something to say in the Republic of Poland and bring about a situation in which the functioning of the Tribunal will not be threatened - announced on Tuesday Bogdan Święczkowski, appointed president of the Constitutional Tribunal.

title: Donald Tusk speaks out on Jacek Kurski's son. "There can be no sacred cows
description: Just because the perpetrator was the son of a prominent PiS politician, the prosecutor's office, instead of prosecuting the accused, did everything to avoid justice" - said Prime Minister Tusk about the case of Zdzisław Kurski. "My son is being attacked by political enemies and an LGBT activist" - claims Jacek Kurski.

title: CBA must be solved. But first we must be able to solve them
description: The act on the liquidation of the CBA and the transfer of the Office's competences to the structures of the police, the ABW and the treasury adopted by the government on Tuesday makes no sense. But this is not about substantive considerations, the concept of the new service, or the general shape of the act.

title: Lawyers on the Last Generation protests: The state should respond to drivers' aggression
description: - The Last Generation's protest is peaceful. However, drivers use violence. And this should be met with a decisive reaction from a democratic state - says the head of Amnesty International Poland.

title: Warsaw Trail on Kopa Cwila vol. 5 - PHOTO REPORT
description: On Sunday, December 8, 2024, we finished this year's series of "Warsaw Running Trails". The last trail this year took place on Kopa Cwila in Warsaw's Ursynów district. 50 people took part in it. We invite you to the next trails next year (details soon), and today we invite you to see the photo report from the last race.

title: Sports St. Nicholas Day at the Moczydło Centre
description: On December 15, 2024, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m., we invite you to a unique ice skating event at the Moczydło Center. We plan shows and animations that will delight every child.

title: Presidential Election 2025. Karol Nawrocki was asked about the price of butter. Here's what he said
description: Karol Nawrocki, the PiS “civic” candidate for President of the Republic of Poland, met with the residents of Siedlce, where he raised the issue of inflation and addressed the recently heated issue of butter prices.

title: Poll: Is the presidential campaign already underway? Poles agree
description: Never before has a presidential campaign picked up so quickly and reached such high speed so many months before the election, as confirmed by the latest poll for "Rzeczpospolita".

title: Antoni Macierewicz arrested by police. He refused to submit to inspection
description: Former Minister of National Defense Antoni Macierewicz, a PiS MP, was detained by the police, TVP Info and TV Republika report. The MP, claiming immunity, refused to undergo a road check and a sobriety test.

title: The Left Will Field Three Candidates for President? "They Put Party Interests Above National Interest
description: If the Razem party puts up its Adrian Zandberg, Senator Waldemar Witkowski from the Labor Union will also run – according to talks in “Rzeczpospolita”. This would mean the fragmentation of the left in the presidential elections on an unprecedented scale.

title: Bogdan Święczkowski gave his first interview to Trwam Television. He indicated his goal as the president of the Constitutional Tribunal
description: The new president of the Constitutional Tribunal, Bogdan Święczkowski, shared his priorities for the next six years in an interview with Telewizja Trwam.

title: Szymon Hołownia: The first round of presidential elections may take place during the May bank holiday
description: I will not resign from the position of Marshal of the Sejm, which is a political position, unlike, for example, the head of the Institute of National Remembrance, who is expected to be apolitical. Karol Nawrocki should resign from his position – Szymon Hołownia, leader of Poland 2050, tells "Rzeczpospolita".

title: Will there be amnesty for Polish volunteers fighting in Ukraine?
description: Illegal, but no longer punishable – the Civic Coalition wants to regulate the participation of Polish citizens in the war in Ukraine against Russia. Even the Confederation does not say "no".

title: The Last Generation explains the reasons for their actions to Poles. "We are not against you
description: Thanks to the protest of several dozen of us, climate topics, climatologists and government statements on the matter appeared on television and in newspapers more often than during the whole of last year. This shows that our method works," emphasize activists from the Last Generation group. "Street blockades are our last resort. We do not want to make your lives difficult or direct your anger against us," they emphasize.

title: Poll: Rafał Trzaskowski or Karol Nawrocki? We know who Poles would vote for
description: The PiS-supported IPN president Karol Nawrocki can count on 30.3% of votes in the first round of the presidential elections to be held in 2025. Rafał Trzaskowski is expected to receive 36.9% of votes, according to a new United Surveys poll conducted for Wirtualna Polska.

title: We know the Youth Word of the Year 2024. What does "sigma" mean?
description: By decision of internet users, the word "sigma" was chosen as the Youth Word of the Year 2024. We explain what it actually means.

title: Donald Tusk speaks about the case of the PiS politician's son. "It shocks all of Poland
description: - There can be no sacred cows in Poland, if there is anything sacred in Poland, it is Polish children - said Prime Minister Donald Tusk, opening the government session.

title: A 53-year-old woman was wounded in the head. Police officers were practicing shooting in the area
description: In the Warmian-Masurian province, a woman was injured near a police exercise. An investigation is underway to determine how the incident occurred.

title: Podcast "School Again": Skibidi, sigma - or how do young people create their own language?
description: For the jurors of this year's "Youth Word of the Year" plebiscite, the most interesting word was "czoó". The meaning is standard, but no one knows why there is an "ó" at the end of the word. Or maybe it's just an "o" with an accent?

title: Details of Andrzej Duda's meeting with Karol Nawrocki have been revealed. "He asked for a conversation
description: The head of the presidential office, Małgorzata Paprocka, when asked whether Andrzej Duda would appear in Karol Nawrocki's election campaign, stated that it is not the role of the head of state to get involved in such matters.

title: The army trains local governments in crisis management. We draw conclusions after the flood
description: Crisis management training begins in Wrocław, which will be conducted by the Territorial Defense Forces in cooperation with experts from the War Studies Academy. The army shows the Jaśmin IT system, which has served the armed forces so far.

title: Jarosław Kaczyński on the protesters in front of the Smolensk monument. "Putin's agency
description: Let's hope that the time for justice will come - that those in Poland who are responsible for causing this catastrophe will be properly assessed by the courts. And if the courts find them guilty, that they will be punished - said PiS chairman Jarosław Kaczyński during a press briefing held at the monument to the Victims of the Smolensk Tragedy of 2010.

title: The Power of Threes: The Weimar Triangle for Rural Europe
description: Geopolitics, geography and geometry can sometimes be combined and something good can come of it. One such moment was a meeting of representatives of different European initiatives for sustainable development organized in the Mazovian countryside. The event, which took place on the first weekend of Advent, combined rural, urban, agricultural and EU perspectives to find a common thread towards a more just and sustainable agri-food system.

title: Radosław Fogiel talks about the arrest of Marcin Romanowski. "PO had a terrible weekend
description: According to PiS MP Radosław Fogel, it was no accident that the actions against Marcin Romanowski were taken "after a rather nightmarish weekend from the Platform's point of view". - They got a beating in terms of political communication, because of Rafał Trzaskowski's very shallow convention and Jarosław Kaczyński's presence on the web - he said.

title: The regulations are not keeping up with the presidential pre-campaign
description: Officially unregistered candidates are still organizing meetings with citizens and printing "non-electoral" posters. A legal loophole allows them to do so.

title: Vice Admiral Krzysztof Jaworski: There is a hybrid war going on in the Baltic Sea
description: In the Baltic Sea, we are dealing with terrorist acts. Hybrid warfare is ongoing, says Vice Admiral Krzysztof Jaworski, commander of the Maritime Operations Center.

title: Poll: Poland almost divided in half over Jarosław Kaczyński's immunity
description: In an IBRiS poll for Radio Zet, respondents were asked how they assessed the Sejm's decision to lift the immunity of Jarosław Kaczyński in connection with accusations of assaulting an activist.

title: Vice Admiral Krzysztof Jaworski: There is a hybrid war going on in the Baltic Sea
description: There is already a hybrid war going on in the Baltic Sea, we are dealing with terrorist acts, says Vice Admiral Krzysztof Jaworski, commander of the Maritime Operations Centre.

title: Jacek Nizinkiewicz: The safety of Kaczyński and protesters in the interest of Tusk
description: Monthly provocations and failure to separate protesters from those paying tribute to those who died in the Smolensk disaster may end in another tragedy. It is the state's duty to provide safe conditions for PiS politicians and their opponents.

title: Poll: Rafał Trzaskowski or Karol Nawrocki? The KO candidate's advantage is decreasing
description: Who would Poles vote for in the second round of the presidential election if Rafał Trzaskowski and Karol Nawrocki made it? In December, the advantage of the Civic Coalition candidate over the candidate supported by Law and Justice decreased.

title: Marcin Romanowski arrested. Comments after court decision
description: PiS and Civic Coalition MPs comment on the court's decision to arrest Marcin Romanowski. The PiS MP's party colleagues speak of a "smiling regime", while members of the ruling coalition speak of "accelerating justice".

title: Kindness of Polish services for Waluś. Christmas presents and sausage smuggled behind bars
description: Political murderer Janusz Waluś returned to Poland at the expense of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Assistance in purchasing a ticket is supposed to be refundable, but the consulate had already been taking surprisingly intensive care of him.

title: “Fake Santa Clauses” and populism – the problems of the Polish economy?
description: Economic policy in Poland is a topic that stirs extreme emotions. In the latest episode of the podcast "Rzecz w tym" we analyze Leszek Balcerowicz's warnings about "false Santa Clauses" handing out expensive gifts to citizens, which in turn burden them. The guest of Monday's podcast episode is Krzysztof Adam Kowalczyk, head of the Economy department of "Rzeczpospolita". We talk about the consequences of handing out money, inflation and economic stagnation, which may prevent Poland from catching

title: New President of the Constitutional Tribunal. Comments after Andrzej Duda's decision
description: President Andrzej Duda has appointed Bogdan Święczkowski as the new president of the Constitutional Tribunal. "Andrzej Duda knows how to deprive this institution of the last remnants of decency" - members of the ruling coalition comment on the president's decision.

title: Michał Szułdrzyński: The Course for Economic Patriotism and Against Globalization. Rafał Trzaskowski's Farewell to Liberalism
description: Rafał Trzaskowski's speech at the convention in Gliwice indicates an ideological change in the Civic Coalition. The criticism of globalization and the rejection of the EU trade agreement with Mercosur are a signal that PO wants to distance itself from elitist demands, directing attention to the problems of millions of Poles.

title: New poll: PiS gains the most and comes out on top
description: PiS has a slight advantage over KO in the IBRiS survey for "Rzeczpospolita". The survey shows a very poor result for the Razem party after it left the Left caucus in the Sejm.

title: There is a prosecutor's office investigation into the death of a professor at a Warsaw university
description: The prosecutor's office has initiated an investigation into the death of Prof. Mirosław Kurkowski, a lecturer at a Warsaw university, who went missing several days ago.

title: This weather is expected until the holidays. The latest forecasts from IMGW
description: There are a dozen or so days left until Christmas. What kind of weather can we expect during that time? Will it be autumn or winter? What about snowfall? Here is the weather forecast for the coming days presented by IMGW.

title: Donald Trump threatens to leave NATO. Radosław Sikorski counts on Andrzej Duda
description: I assume that there is an intensive dialogue between President (Andrzej) Duda and the president-elect (Donald Trump), said Minister of Foreign Affairs Radosław Sikorski at a press conference.

title: Media: Trump invited Xi to his inauguration
description: US President-elect Donald Trump has invited Chinese leader Xi Jinping to his inauguration in Washington, CBS News reported. Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban is also mentioned as a possible guest.

title: Legia and Jagiellonia to extend "European dream"? Today more LK matches
description: The 5th round of the Conference League regular season is ahead of us. Both Legia Warsaw, who will host Swiss Lugano, and Jagiellonia Białystok, whose rival in the Czech Republic will be FK Mlada Boleslav, will want to continue their successful streak and take another step towards direct promotion to the 1/8 finals of the competition.

title: South Korea's president defends himself, calling it a "monster that destroys order
description: Martial law was supposed to protect the constitutional order, not be a coup, South Korean President Jun Suk Jeol explained on Thursday. The opposition party plans to put a motion to impeach him to a vote next Saturday.

title: Is it finally good or bad? Experts explain Tusk's decision regarding TVN and Polsat
description: Next week, TVN and Polsat are to be added to the list of strategic companies. Experts in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl positively assess Prime Minister Donald Tusk's announcement. - Hostile actions are ongoing in the infosphere - emphasizes Jan Dworak.

title: The end of one of the ZPR Media Group's businesses. There will be layoffs
description: The ZPR Media Group has closed the VIVELO Book and Media Fair project. This is expected to result in layoffs, although as the Group's press office explains to us, "we have offered some of the people who worked on organizing the Fair jobs in other positions.

title: KRRiT agrees to TVP's plan. Praise for savings
description: The National Broadcasting Council unanimously accepted the program and financial plans for 2025 of eight regional stations of Polish Radio and Polish Television. As KRRiT member Prof. Tadeusz Kowalski reported in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl, during the meeting TVP was praised for demonstrating great savings in the implementation of the mission, reducing costs by almost PLN 0.5 billion.

title: FAQ: From Legal to Human. How TVN and Polsat Can Change Owner
description: Prime Minister Donald Tusk announced that TVN and Polsat will be entered on the list of strategic companies. This means that changing their owner will be more difficult than changing ordinary companies. Sebastian Urban, legal counsel from the Media Law Firm, explains in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl that in practice the government would have to issue consent after recommendations from, among others, the Internal Security Agency or the Intelligence Agency.

title: Biedronka is the first commercial brand to use the new advertising platform
description: GroupM and the Wavemaker agency, in cooperation with the Biedronka brand (Jeronimo Martins Polska), have prepared the first commercial Advanced TV campaign using the GPW DAI platform. Partners in this test project also include Telewizja Puls and the Korbank cable network, as well as Emitel.

title: On TV Republika there are four times fewer advertisements, but seven times more money
description: In November, TV Republika broadcast four times fewer commercials than a year ago, but earned seven times more on them. The number of brands active in advertising on the station dropped from 240 to 101 - according to an analysis by Wirtualnemedia.pl.

title: It is known who will replace Ibisz on Polsat's New Year's Eve
description: Polsat has revealed all the hosts of this year's New Year's Eve Power of Hits. Influencer Julia Żugaj will be joined on stage by well-known presenters of the station - Paulina Sykut-Jeżyna and Maciej Rock, however, the Polsat concert will be hosted by a total of three duets.

title: Filming for "Mam Talent!" has begun. No more rumors about cast changes
description: On Tuesday, the recording of the casting episodes for the 16th edition of the program "Mam Talent!" began, which will last until mid-January. The jury and the audience watched the first performances of the participants, who were accompanied backstage by the hosts of the program: Agnieszka Woźniak-Starak and Jan Pirowski.

title: Someone is killing in the Tatras. Review of the series "Śleboda" from SkyShowtime
description: SkyShowtime has added a new Polish series, "Śleboda," directed by Michał Gazda. The crime drama is based on a novel by Małgorzata Fugiel-Kuźmińska and Michał Kuźmiński. The production touches on a topic also known from this year's film, "White Courage," the Goralenvolk, and its modern interpretation.

title: Regional stations of Polish Radio want more from advertising. "Reaction to inflation
description: Audytorium17, an association of seventeen regional Polish Radio stations, will increase advertising prices by an average of 15 percent from January 2025. - The price list adjustment is the result of the new commercial policy adopted by the company and is a response to inflation, which forces us to adjust our price lists - explains Piotr Bziuk, client service director at Audytorium17, in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl.

title: Canal+ Polska signal stolen again by Palestinian station
description: Palestinian television Fajer TV1 is stealing Canal+ Polska's signal again. The latest match was La Liga Girona - Real Madrid. Part of the Canal+ Sport logo and the words "Live" were visible on the screen. - We will submit a letter demanding that they stop distributing our content - informs Wirtualnemedia.pl Piotr Kaniowski, spokesman for Canal+ Polska.

title: This weekend sees the debut of the TVP cabaret show. What have the comedians prepared?
description: On Saturday, December 14, the program "Kabaret Łączy Genera" will debut on Dwójka, featuring satirists of the younger and older generations. The station has revealed the details of the new program.

title: Journalist leaves Viaplay
description: Adam Drygalski is parting ways with Viaplay, where he worked as head of publishers. In the past, he worked with Polsat, Orange Sport and Weszło, among others.

title: Champions League stations for free. Canal+ promotion returns
description: New satellite subscribers to the digital platform Canal+ can once again gain up to five months of free access to the Champions League package. Current customers, after activating this package, gain four months for free. - The promotion enjoyed such great interest that it has returned - informs Wirtualnemedia.pl Piotr Kaniowski, spokesman for Canal+ Polska.

title: The Ministry of Agriculture has chosen an agency for an online campaign
description: The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development has announced a tender for conducting a campaign on the Internet and in social media. Nine agencies have applied.

title: They disassemble cars "For parts". New episodes of the podcast of Polskie Radio Kierowców
description: Polskie Radio Kierowców invites listeners and internet users to new episodes of the automotive program "Na Części", in which Kuba Marcinowicz tests interesting car models. As the station assures, this season too, there are many surprises waiting for viewers.

title: Krzysztof Wąsowski, head of marketing at RITS
description: Krzysztof Wąsowski has taken up the position of marketing director at RITS, a company operating in the technology industry.

title: The pace of change is accelerating. Download our 2025 Trendbook
description: The media, marketing and digital services market is changing dynamically. What was this year like and what will the next one be like? Download BRAND NEW(S) Trendbook 2025.
